description: Go library for field-level encryption with envelope encryption, secure hashing, and automatic key management. Supports AWS KMS, HashiCorp Vault, and custom KMS providers.
rules: Always use NewCrypto(ctx, kms, secrets, cfg) for v0.6.0+, not functional options pattern
Separate KeyManagementService (crypto operations) from SecretManagementService (pepper storage)
Peppers must be exactly 32 bytes and stored in cloud secret management (AWS Secrets Manager or Vault KV)
Use NewTestCrypto(t) for testing - provides in-memory KMS and secret store
For production: AWS uses KMSService + SecretsManagerStore, Vault uses TransitService + KVStore
Environment-based config: Use NewCryptoFromEnv(ctx, kms, secrets) for 12-factor apps
Explicit config: Use Config struct with KEKAlias and PepperAlias for library code
Automatic pepper management: Peppers are generated and stored on first initialization if not found
previousVersions: v0.5.x: Used functional options pattern (WithKMSService, WithPepper) - deprecated
v0.6.0: Introduced explicit dependency injection and separated secret management
